scripts.packager-win64: git-bash ./packager.sh win32 x64 #只能在windows系统上运行此打包脚本
scripts.packager-win32: git-bash ./packager.sh win32 ia32 #只能在windows系统上运行此打包脚本
scripts.packager-darwin64: ./packager.sh darwin x64 #只能在*unix系统上运行此打包脚本
scripts.packager-win: npm run packager-win64 && npm run packager-win32
scripts.packager-unix: npm run packager-linux64 && npm run packager-linux32 && npm run packager-darwin64
scripts.packager-win-can-package: npm run packager-win64 && npm run packager-win32 && git-bash ./packager.sh linux x64 && git-bash ./packager.sh linux ia32
